title: EV maker Ather raises $128 million in funding round led by NIIF, Hero MotoCorp
description: Tarun Mehta, cofounder of Ather Energy, told ET the funds will be used for expanding manufacturing facilities, to grow the company's retail network, and for research and development and charging infrastructure.
